casebody.data:
Maurice A. BURRIS
v.
THOMAS, Commissioner of DMV-16P16-1. No. 16P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 20, 2016. Kathryne E. Hathcock, Assistant Attorney General, for Thomas, Kelly J. *470Jennifer M. Chandler, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Burris, Maurice.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of January 2016 by Petitioner-Appellant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of January 2016."
